channel.title: Arch on Mike Webb Tech
channel.description: Recent content in Arch on Mike Webb Tech

item.title: Arch Linux UEFI install on NVMe drives
item.description: A guide created from memory and some notes on how I installed Arch Linux (BTW) using UEFI settings, NVMe storage. and LVM filesystem. Grub now supports NVMe but not “exotic” filesystems like LVM or LUKS encryption as the root (/) filesystem
